backend/main.mo: Implements a canister storing contact form submissions and project images with CRUD-style submission and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries describing updates to the solar calculator’s max bill value and input validation changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of various frontend components, hooks, pages, and configurations.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, preload optimizations, and security headers.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Defines basic crawling rules allowing all agents with a crawl delay.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, icons, theme colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing main site sections with last modified dates and image metadata.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing simple caching, fetch handling, and cache versioning.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing all site sections and initializing performance, preload, and service worker logic.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section with animated counters triggered by intersection observer and styled content.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, smooth reveal animation, and submission via a custom mutation hook. Builds a formatted message payload and resets the form on success.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, social links, quick navigation, and scroll-to-section actions. Includes branded visuals and structured contact details.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Displays a categorized project gallery with intersection-based reveal animations. Provides image tabs and dialog-based viewing for multiple residential and commercial projects.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Creates a sticky header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, mobile menu handling, and quick contact info. Supports smooth scrolling to page sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the hero section with a parallax background, animated visuals, and buttons that scroll to services or contact. Tracks scroll position for parallax effects.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalQuot: Displays animated motivational quote cards with icons and images that appear when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/components/Partners.tsx: Renders a grid of partner logos with fade‑in animations and decorative backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/PMSuryaGhar.tsx: Shows details of the PM Surya Ghar Yojana, including subsidies, DBT, loan benefits, and animated section reveal.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Presents key solar service offerings and benefits with animated cards and images.
Provides an interactive solar savings calculator using roof area, monthly bill, and city sun hours with animated section reveal.
frontend/src/components/Testimonials.tsx: A testimonial carousel with auto-rotation, intersection-based animations, and navigation controls displaying customer reviews.
frontend/src/components/Vision.tsx: A section component showing the company's vision with intersection-triggered animations and decorative visuals.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppChatButt: A floating WhatsApp chat button linking to a preset number with hover tooltip and animated styling.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: A feature and strengths showcase section with animated reveal behavior and structured lists of selling points.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state, and exposing login/logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for contact form submissions and gallery queries, dependent on the actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for dark theme colors, layout, and animation performance settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors based on CSS variables, extended themes, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending requests related to increasing the electricity bill calculator limit.
